body_html:
From cudnn 7.0.1 release notes:

Fixed bug that produced a silent computation error for when a batch size was larger
than 65536 for CUDNN_CONVOLUTION_FWD_ALGO_IMPLICIT_PRECOMP_GEMM .

Although the release notes didn't say whether it works or fails loudly in 7.0.1. But it certainly doesn't work with cudnn 6.
body_text:
From cudnn 7.0.1 release notes:
Fixed bug that produced a silent computation error for when a batch size was larger
than 65536 for CUDNN_CONVOLUTION_FWD_ALGO_IMPLICIT_PRECOMP_GEMM .

Although the release notes didn't say whether it works or fails loudly in 7.0.1. But it certainly doesn't work with cudnn 6.
body:
From cudnn 7.0.1 release notes:
```
Fixed bug that produced a silent computation error for when a batch size was larger
than 65536 for CUDNN_CONVOLUTION_FWD_ALGO_IMPLICIT_PRECOMP_GEMM .
```
Although the release notes didn't say whether it works or fails loudly in 7.0.1. But it certainly doesn't work with cudnn 6.
